ingredients.item: ½ x 280g jar sliced artichoke hearts marinated in garlic & parsley, drained over a bowl
1 red onion, halved and thinly sliced
Zest and 2 tbsp juice of 1 essential Lemon
2 tsp Cooks’ Ingredients Nonpareille Capers, drained

instructions.step: Spoon 1 tbsp of the oil from the artichokes into a medium saucepan. Fry the onion for 10 minutes over a medium-high heat until softened and caramelising. Tip in the pine nuts and cook for 1 minute until toasted.

Stir the cauliflower couscous and sultanas into the onions, then add 2 tbsp water and let the cauliflower warm through. Off the heat, stir in the lemon zest and juice, add the capers, then season to taste.
Tip into a serving bowl, fold in the artichokes and their garlic, then serve with the sourdough.
